com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.synchronization

Class DefaultSynchronize

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.shared.AbstractSynchronize
      • com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.network.synchronization.DefaultSynchronize
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Awaiting, Synchronize

    @Synchronized
public class DefaultSynchronize
extends AbstractSynchronize
    This is the default entry for Synchronize-instances.

    You may provide an Runnable, that should be run if an error occurs

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
